fields.request: Validate login passkey toggle respects setting
fields.request_details: Set PASSKEY_LOGIN_ENABLED=0 (the default) and reload the public login page to confirm the "Use a passkey" button no longer renders below the primary submit button. Then enable PASSKEY_LOGIN_ENABLED=1, restart the service, and verify the passkey button returns, triggers the WebAuthn prompt, and still displays success, cancel, and error status messages.
